posts.slug: Ubuntu 17.10 中文桌面环境配置
posts.text: Ubuntu 17.10 桌面环境配置清理不必要的软件12345# 删除不必要的软件sudo apt remove --purge libreoffice-common sudo apt remove --purge empathy brasero simple-scan gnome-mahjongg aisleriot gnome-mines cheese transmission-common gnome-orca gnome-sudoku landscape-client-ui-install unity-webapps-common onboard deja-dupsudo apt remove --purge unity-lens-photos 初始化中文环境1234567# 安装中文语言包sudo apt install -y language-pack-zh-hans*sudo apt install -y language-pack-gnome-zh-hans*sudo apt install -y ibus-sunpinyinsudo apt install -y fonts-wqy-microhei# 运行语言支持检查sudo apt install -y $(check-language-support) 安装必备软件12345678# 更新Ubuntusudo apt install -f && apt update && apt upgrade && apt autoremove && apt clean # 安装VIMsudo apt install -y vim# 安装chrome浏览器sudo apt install -y chromium-browser# 安装Tweak优化软件sudo apt install -y gnome-tweak-tool 必要的开发辅助软件1sudo apt install -y git npm python-pip 必要的优化易用性优化12345# 修改字体gsettings set org.gnome.desktop.wm.preferences titlebar-font 'Cantarell Bold 11'gsettings set org.gnome.desktop.interface font-name 'Cantarell 11'gsettings set org.gnome.desktop.interface document-font-name 'Sans 11'gsettings set org.gnome.desktop.interface monospace-font-name "Monospace 11" 应用程序自动分类12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849gsettings set org.gnome.desktop.app-folders folder-children "['accessories', 'chrome-apps', 'games', 'graphics', 'internet', 'office', 'programming', 'science', 'sound---video', 'system-tools', 'universal-access', 'wine']"gsettings set org.gnome.desktop.app-folders.folder:/org/gnome/desktop/app-folders/folders/accessories/ name "Accessories"gsettings set org.gnome.desktop.app-folders.folder:/org/gnome/desktop/app-folders/folders/accessories/ categories "['Utility']"gsettings set posts.title: Hello Hexo
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

shadowsocks 服务器安装1. 服务器环境 Ubuntu Server python 2. 基础软件准备1234# 安装pipsudo apt install python-pip# 安装加密支持组件sudo apt install python–setuptools m2crypto 解决pip版本低无法升级的问题wget https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.pypython3 get-pip.py 3. 安装shadowsocks服务端软件1sudo pip install shadowsocks 4. 配置文件准备1vim /etc/shadowsocks.json 单用户配置模式123456789{ "server":"my_server_ip", "server_port":8388, "password":"mypassword", "local_address": "127.0.0.1", "local_port":1080, "timeout":300, "method":"aes-256-cfb"} 多用户配置模式123456789101112{ "server":"my_server_ip", "port_password":{ "端口" :"密码" "8387": "foobar1", "8388": "foobar2" }, "local_address": "127.0.0.1", "local_port":1080, "timeout":300, "method":"rc4-md5"} 12 TIPS: 加密方式推荐使用rc4-md5，RC4比AES速度快好几倍。旧的RC4加密不安全，现在问题已经修复，可以放心使用。 5. 启动SS服务器12sudo ssserver -c /etc/shadowsocks.json -d start# 重启、停止 ...restart / stop 6. 流量统计 iptables -I OUTPUT -s 192.0.0.1 -p tcp –sport 8837 iptables -n -v -L -t filter |grep dpt:8387 | awk ‘{print $2}’ 7. 限制连接数123#限制端口并发数很简单，IPTABLES就能搞定了，假设你要限制端口8388的IP最大连接数为5，两句话命令：iptables -I INPUT -p tcp --dport 8388 -m connlimit --connlimit-above 5 -j DROPiptables -I OUTPUT -p tcp --dport 8388 -m connlimit --connlimit-above 5 -j DROP 8. 限制端口的速度123#限制端口并发数很简单，IPTABLES就能搞定了，假设你要限制端口5037的最大连接速度为60个包每秒iptables -A INPUT -p tcp --sport 5037 -m limit --limit 60/s -j ACCEPTiptables -A INPUT -p tcp --sport 5037 -j DROP
